tag_list: adnan-ebrahim, entrepreneur, internet-business, startup, car-throttle, performance-car-reviews, ucl-student, economics-undergraduate
overview:
Awards:

  • Young Achiever Nominee in English Asian Business Awards 2012
  • Virgin Media’s December 2011 “Pioneer of the Month”
  • Runner Up in “2010 Enterprising Student of the Year” by Real World Magazine
  • Finalist in “2010 UCL Societies Personality of the Year” by UCL Union

Having been involved in web business since the young age of 16, Adnan has always demonstrated a keen enthusiasm for business and internet entrepreneurship.

In February 2006 Adnan launched his first internet business, and in December 2008 this business was acquired by an American company. Following this success, Adnan founded Car Throttle and has grown the site into a well-known brand which works with the world’s major automotive manufacturers and negotiates and closes advertising deals with leading insurance brokers, price comparison websites and aftermarket specialist websites.

Adnan graduated from University College London with a BSc in Economics. During his time at University, he became President of UCL Entrepreneurs Society and in 2 years, he managed to grow the Society into a Top 10 Club at UCL.
